org.libav

Interface IMediaWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPacketConsumer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMediaWriter

    public interface IMediaWriter
extends IPacketConsumer
    Media writer interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Detail

      • getFormatContext

        IFormatContextWrapper getFormatContext()
        Get format context. DO NOT use this method unless you know what you are doing.
        Returns:
        format context

      • getInterleave

        boolean getInterleave()
        Check whether the packet interleaving is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled, false otherwise

      • setInterleave

        void setInterleave(boolean interleave)
        Enable or disable the packet interleaving.
        Parameters:
        interleave - true to enable it, false to disable it

      • getStreamCount

        int getStreamCount()
        Get number of streams.
        Returns:
        number of streams

      • getStream

        IStreamWrapper getStream(int streamIndex)
        Get stream wrapper for the stream at the given index.
        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a strem index
        Returns:
        stream wrapper

      • getVideoStreamCount

        int getVideoStreamCount()
        Get number of video streams.
        Returns:
        number of video streams

      • addVideoStream

        int addVideoStream(int codecId,
                 int width,
                 int height)
                   throws LibavException
        Create a new video stream.
        Parameters:
        codecId - a codec ID
        width - a frame width
        height - a frame height
        Returns:
        index of the created video stream
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while creating a new stream

      • getVideoStream

        IStreamWrapper getVideoStream(int videoStreamIndex)
        Get stream wrapper for the video stream at the given index.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video strem index
        Returns:
        stream wrapper

      • getAudioStreamCount

        int getAudioStreamCount()
        Get number of audio streams.
        Returns:
        number of audio streams

      • addAudioStream

        int addAudioStream(int codecId,
                 int sampleRate,
                 int sampleFormat,
                 int channelCount)
                   throws LibavException
        Create a new audio stream.
        Parameters:
        codecId - a codec ID
        sampleRate - a sample rate
        sampleFormat - a sample format
        channelCount - a number of channels
        Returns:
        index of the created audio stream
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while creating a new stream

      • getAudioStream

        IStreamWrapper getAudioStream(int audioStreamIndex)
        Get stream wrapper for the audio stream at the given index.
        Parameters:
        audioStreamIndex - an audio strem index
        Returns:
        stream wrapper

      • writeHeader

        void writeHeader()
                 throws LibavException
        Write format header. This method should be called after creating of all streams and before writing any packet.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while writing the header

      • writeTrailer

        void writeTrailer()
                  throws LibavException
        Write format trailer. This method should be called after writing all packets.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while writing the trailer

      • getSdp

        java.lang.String getSdp()
                        throws LibavException
        Get the SDP. DO NOT call this method before the writeHeader is called.
        Returns:
        SDP text representation
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while creating the SDP

      • createSdpFile

        void createSdpFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                   throws LibavException,
                          java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generate the SDP and write it to the file. DO NOT call this method before the writeHeader is called.
        Parameters:
        fileName - a file name
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while creating the SDP
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given file name does not represent a writeable file

      • close

        void close()
           throws LibavException
        Close the writer and release all its resources.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while closing

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the writer is closed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the writer is closed, false otherwise
